ComicInfo.Series: Bettie Page and the Alien Agenda
ComicInfo.Summary: Following a nearly deadly escapade in Egypt, Bettie and her team, Young-ja and Sofia, cautiously jet off to their next clue location in Greece. This time, the ladies set out on their own, without backup, but hopefully better prepared to handle any traps that may await them. Can they find the alien weapon stockpile before the aliens return to retrieve it? Can Bettie keep her whole team safe this time? And why does Bettie keep getting these weird feelings along the way? Find out as we head to the ruins of the ancient Greek, Palace of Knossos!

ComicInfo.Title: Greece and Desist!
